website_summaries.verdict: An environmentally friendly alternative to the Swiffer, although its swivel head design is not as good.
pros: Washable cleaning cloths switch out quickly
Reaches baseboards and under furniture easily
cons: Smaller surface area than other dry mops
Flimsy pad attachment latch and handle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great mop. Been using mine for around 3 years now for housekeeping and just bought a new one for my husband that is joining me on my business adventures. We use it when washing ceilings baseboards and walls even! I slightly altered mine by adding a telescoping handle for a little extra convenience when doing hard to reach areas. If mine ever breaks I will buy the same one again! 100% recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: nikkicola54

customer_reviews.title: Good values, multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than disposable in the long run. I bought 3. One I spray floor with wood cleaner and use this mop head. Another I spray floor with lysol and use this mop head, sometimes I spray floor with floor cleaner and use this mop head, and sometimes I use it dry for dusting. I really need four but easy enough to wash.. stays on when in use. I use once, wash, dry, reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jb h

customer_reviews.title: It's handy, but not that special
customer_reviews.text: It's an inexpensive, ok mop/broom. I use it for frequent touch ups on the hard wood floors. It's easier to use than a broom, but for a thorough cleaning, I still get out the vacuum. I find that the Scotch Brite mop leaves particles behind, especially in corners. I also notice some dust just being pushed around, much like dusting with a dry paper towel. It works better when damp and the head needs to be cleaned frequently. I think you'll find it handy, but temper expectations. It may not be the complete solution you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: cylegreen

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!!
customer_reviews.text: The pole is one solid piece so it is strong enough to clean the floor without breaking like most of the other models on the market. This is probably the third one I have purchased in a decade because the clip that holds the mop head together breaks or wears out but it is cheap enough to replace and I already have a bunch of mope heads that won't fit any other models so it is well worth it. The microfiber mop heads work great, they can be washed in the machine and they haven't worn out on me yet!
customer_reviews.author: I. Murray

customer_reviews.title: The best part is that you can use any kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, this thing beats the HECK out of the Swiffer. It really does catch all the stuff that my broom leaves behind, which especially rocks because there are two girls in this household and MAN does a lot of our hair end up on the floor. This thing picks up all the hair. The best part is that you can use any kind of cleaner you want with it, so you're not stuck with whatever cleaner they put on the Swiffer pads. Plus, you get to just leave the pad on for awhile instead of replacing it every time. It's also really good at buffing out those more obnoxious spots on the floor. Totally recommend this thing.
customer_reviews.author: DizzyStar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light-weight mop.
customer_reviews.text: This microfiber hardwood floor mop works great. This mop is an improvement to an earlier Scotch-Brite mop version which was smaller - this one is much longer (the mop is about 16 inches long by 6 inches wide) and thus cleans more surface and faster with each push and pull. The handle is very lightweight aluminum (easy on the arms) and the mop really cleans thoroughly while picking up lots of dirt and hair easily. If you have a hardwood floor or tile (or other hard surface), this is a good way to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one of these love them.
customer_reviews.text: My first one finally broke after years of use and I replaced it with this one. I use this to clean my laminate floors with vinegar and water. Does a great job and economical way to clean and great on environment because it is reusable nothing to waste into our landfills unlike that other product on the market.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Gets it done!
customer_reviews.text: I just had new laminate floors installed in my home and the contractors left a huge dusty mess behind. Cleaning with this microfiber mop was a breeze and now the laminate looks amazing! I just combined 1 part vinegar to 3 parts water plus a little dish soap in a spray bottle, sprayed the microfiber, and got to work. Picked up all the dust and left shine behind without too much scrubbing. I like that the head swivels, which makes getting in smaller spaces easy.
customer_reviews.author: Allie D

customer_reviews.title: Way Bigger and Better than my old swiffer
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for almost a year I think. Just ordered more refills so I have many to rotate. Use them on hardwood floors in my exercise studio where there are not shoes, but lots of dust and human hair. They pick up a ton, and we just brush them with a scrub brush into the trash between uses. After about a week I just launder them with towels. But I have about 5 refills so that I can use a new one whenever I want. They're very big and very smooth on the floor and so pick up tons of stuff while polishing the floor. After laundering they are like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Longo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the mop I've been looking for. It works really well for my hardwood floors. I got it in conjunction with Bora Floor Cleaner and finally there are not foot and dog prints all over my hardwood. What's so great about this mop is that it is VERY lightweight. Such a change from pushing around my steam mop. Not only is it lightweight but the head turns on a whim so it's easy to mop against the floorboards. The microfiber cover swiftly picks up hair and dirt. Great for us because we have a German Shepherd dog and a toddler. Finally it doesn't feel like such a chore to mop floors.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this because of the rave reviews but I was disappointed. The head has a really awkward way of reloading the cloth. The cloth is a strange texture that doesn't seem to clean the floor well. The surface area seems small--smaller than my other cloth mop. Dry, it leaves a lot of fur and dust behind. It comes unscrewed sometimes. Not impressed. Probably will end up at the thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: ALL YOU NEED IS HERE
customer_reviews.text: If you have been fighting with your hardwood floors and using every product, scrubbed on your hands and knees and thrown away endless mops, trying to get your floors to shine, don't give up. I used this with Quivk Shine and in five minutes, the floor I had been working on for four years was a sparkling beauty! I am so happy! I finally found something that works and at last I'm proud of my beautiful wood floors. I was ready to pay to get them refinished! After using I just rinsed it out in water and hung it out on a hanger to dry and it was ready to use again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the expectations were low for this mop refill. The experience was very positive. It had good absorbancy, was easy to wash off and worked well with the wringer on the mop. Overall very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Used for years wash n ware well.
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years they are very durable they wash well and they clean floors very well. Have no idea why they want to give me a refund we love the products and don't want to refund
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: I hate using something once and then tossing it
customer_reviews.text: I still have several of these mop heads that I bought over 8 years ago, when I initially bought the whole mop. They last FOREVER. They pick up pet hair just as well as Swiffers, and they are washable and reusable. I hate using something once and then tossing it. So wasteful! So, if you want to cut down on waste and save money, this is the way to go. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Scotch Brute Mop
customer_reviews.text: Just as the other reviewers said, this mop picks up all of the dog hair off my wood floor and doesn't leave any stragglers. It swivels easily to fit around furniture and walls and the fact that I can easily remove the mop head and throw it in the wash makes it the perfect mop. I bought 2 extra heads so I wouldn't have to wait for a load of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Christie D. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Microfiber replacements at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: My Scotch Brite hardwood floor mop is the best mop I have ever used and I was happy to find that the microfiber replacements are available to purchase on Amazon! They fit perfectly and it is great to use one while the other is in the laundry basket. The microfiber mophead replacement really cleans the spots on the floor well with your favorite hardwood or laminate cleaner. I will buy more as needed. Thank you Amazon for the convenience and great price.
customer_reviews.author: G&J  Jensen

customer_reviews.text: Decent mop. I recently got laminated wooden floors and this is a good tool to keep my room clean. Great price point. Only bummer about this is after the first wash, the microfiber cloth became flatter, less "fluffy", so less effective than first use. I've had this for months now though, and it's good overall. If it broke though, I don't think I would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Afroza Sultana

customer_reviews.title: My floor's best friend :)
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I LOVE this mop!!! I have dark pergo floors where every particle of dust is showcased with or without light. I tried some other floor mops including the Swiffer, clorox and Mr Clean but none of them have the microfiber pads like this one! The pads are solid yet soft and are BIG so I cover more area in less time. I absolutely love this mop and already purchased 3-4 more pads so I can use them back to back :) I use this mop with Black Diamond Wood and Laminate Floor Cleaner and the mop does not leave any marks on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: HyeMama

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as I was tired of filling the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was tired of filling the landfill with Swiffer pads and those Swiffer pads didnt seem to pick up half the hair and dust off the floor anyway. These do a fairly decent job, I whip round this the mop everyday, particularly in the bedroom, they wash well, I just make sure I use vinegar in the rinse water and not fabric conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Dearie

customer_reviews.title: I love this floor mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor mop! I have laminate floors and a dog that sheds...this is perfect! Larger area on mop head, swivels, gets under items and traps dirt, dog hair, dust, everything! I ordered a replacement mop cover so I always have one ready to dust the floor and one to mop the floor. I have used this with floor cleaner and just straight water for damp mopping. Does not leave streaks. I actually enjoy cleaning the floors now!
customer_reviews.author: Rox Sailors

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the older version
customer_reviews.text: This product has replaced the older model of the microfiber hardwood floor mop. The handle and the microfiber head have both changed. Although this version is wider and covers more area, it doesn't seem to glide and maneuver as smoothly as the older version. Therefore I am keeping the older one at my house and giving this to my father-in-law to use.
customer_reviews.author: MountainDad

customer_reviews.title: Durable mop for any floor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mop on my wood floors and stone floors for the past 5 years With washable mop pads, I don’t need to continually buy disposal of pads. I just bought my second mop for my second house. I’m still using my original pads for the daily mopping
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: An excellent daily-use mop
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop daily on both our hardwood flooring and on the ceramic tile. The microfiber grabs dirt, dust bunnies and dog hair like a magnet. Take the mop outside, shake the stuff off, pick off the final few, and throw the removable microfiber part in the washer with the husband's work clothes. It comes out clean as new. Bought a 2nd microfiber cover so I can rotate with the wash cycle. Handle is very sturdy as is the connection to the mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gorton

customer_reviews.title: Great product / high priced / compare cost!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I don't write reviews, unless it is an instance like this. I purchased this mop from amazon for $14.95 and a refill for $7.46 with tax "free shipping" as a prime member. So my total order for both was $22.39. I then go to Costco, where I also pay a membership, and to see the SAME mop and it came with the extra refill attached, for approximately $12.00 without tax.... wow, Amazon, I don't mind paying a BIT more, after paying my prime membership (which is going up $$) for the delivery convenience, but really??? p.s., this is a great product, just look for it at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use over and over
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my floors to wash and polish. I prefer these over the toss-aways. They wash well with towels, etc
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Best mop for my pergo floors!
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I LOVE this mop!!! I have dark pergo floors where every particle of dust is showcased with or without light. I tried some other floor mops including the Swiffer, clorox and Mr Clean but none of them have the microfiber pads like this one! The pads are solid yet soft and are BIG so I cover more area in less time. I absolutely love this mop and already purchased 3-4 more pads so I can use them back to back :) I use this mop with Black Diamond Wood and Laminate Floor Cleaner and the mop does not leave any marks on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: HyeMama

customer_reviews.title: Goes in the washer really black and comes out like new!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that sheds a lot and a baby, so I need to clean our floors everyday. Vacuuming takes forever, so I decided to give this a try. In less than 10 minutes I'm done cleaning a 1000sq ft. apartment (all harwood floors). I collect all the dust in one corner near my vacuum and then vacuum only that corner, very convenient and the refill washes really well. Goes in the washer really black and comes out like new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So light and so effective
customer_reviews.text: We love using these things, both for dry sweep up style use and also for cleaning the floor. One issue I do have is where there are spots (like spilled sugary sweet tea, for example), it seems we have to work hard at really getting the contact between the mop and the sugar. I press my foot on the mop and wiggle it around to get up the spots, which is fine, no bg deal....but when there are bigger messes and spots on the floor, it becomes a problem....this is why I had to go 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Just another Jo(anna)

customer_reviews.title: 21st century mop
customer_reviews.text: I must have been one of the last people in the world using kitchen sponge mops to clean my hardwood floors and the sponge would get gross quickly. I hated to have to keep buying sponges. Wet Jet wipes were a step up but didn't do the trick and became expensive to keep buying $7 boxes of wipes. Swiffer works good, but the dry wipes are no good for using wood cleaner. Finally I have a product that can do the functions of all three of the above products AND I can easily wash the microfiber cloth. What a score!
customer_reviews.author: Working for a living

customer_reviews.title: A great mop
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mop I have found that cleans along the edges. If I run it back and forth along the door casings it cleans all the corners. You can also do the casings with it. This mop washes great in the machine and goes into the dryer. I cannot get on my hands and knees so am glad I finally found a mop to clean the edges as well as the middle. I would recommend this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I looked at lots of expensive sprayer mops and opted not to buy one when repeatedly reading that the sprayer quits working almost immediately. We just handspray the hardwood floor cleaner and mop up after. Way cheaper than the ones that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Cf

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this mop is that it isn't really hard to push around the floors. All you need is a little cleaning solution in a spray bottle and you're set. The other nice thing is that the cleaning pad has a little extra edging on the ends so you can go right up next to a wall without scratching or bumping the baseboards. The cleaning pad fits snug so you're not worried about it coming and scratching the wood floors with plastic. It's also a cinch to remove and clean. If you have hard surfaces that need to be cleaned regularly, then this is the mop you want.
customer_reviews.author: JasonJ

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop hands down for hardwood floors. I have tried many different cloths, mops, swiffers, etc in an attempt to shine my hardwood floors without streaking. All have left ugly streaks and the only success I had was getting on hands and knees with a towel and spray cleaner. I was waiting anxiously for this mop to arrive, and as soon as it did, I unwrapped it and used it with Bruce hardwood floor cleaner spray and presto, shiny hardwood with no streaking without getting on hands and knees.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. Bought it to use on my laminate floor as suggested. However I found that it worked great on my windows. A little windex and I was able to reach the top of my windows inside and out. I did buy a extra pad so I would have 2 ready to go and you just through them in the washer and use again.
customer_reviews.author: DonBarb

customer_reviews.title: Finally found them!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase these at Target for about half the price, and was so disappointed to find out they were being discontinued (at least in retail stores). I can't understand for the life of me why. They are the best microfiber refills you can buy, and I've tried them all. I'm just grateful they are still in existence, and really don't mind paying a heftier price because they really make my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: RunaroundSue

customer_reviews.title: A very cheap floor mop that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I've used many cotton floor mop so microfiber mop is something new to me. I got the mop today so I used it to mop the entire floor and I have to say it was a pleasant mopping experience. The mop has a nicer feedback than my previous cotton ones while mopping. The description says that Microfiber is superior than cotton at picking up dirt, but I didn't notice a significant difference though. Overall, this is a very cheap mop that get's the job done.
customer_reviews.author: aVeryNiceDude

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of open space in my house, and I use these mop pads all the time. They are large enough to have great traction and cover space quickly and evenly. I think if they were any larger they wouldn't work as well. They are fantastic, and I just bought 2 more refills so I can always have clean pads upstairs and downstairs. I clean my floors with a combination of warm water, dish soap and vinegar, and I am consistantly amazed at how much dirt these mops pick up every week. It really feel like my floors are actually cleaner in the end.
customer_reviews.author: ccs0411

customer_reviews.title: Just like the orginial!
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my Scotch-brite mop. Just like the original. Just wish it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: preader

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works beautifully, picking up a lot more than a Swiffer. It can handle dust, small crumbs, and even small pieces of metal. And that's just using it dry. I haven't tested the wet cleaning part yet; however, I don't expect that to disappoint when the time comes. In any event, the product is worth the cost for the super-Swiffer abilities alone. I highly recommend it, especially for laminate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: STREAK FREE
customer_reviews.text: I have literally been cleaning my dark laminate floors on my hands and knees to get the streaks out. Finally had an epiphany and realized microfiber cleans flat screens and black appliances without streaks, why not floors. So wish I thought of this years ago!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Will work for us!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using just a swiffer with a microfiber clothe wrapped around it. I wanted something a little sturdier and larger. This fit the bill. We have a puppy that sheds like crazy and all hardwood floors I use homemade floor spray made with vinegar and essential oils with this. I may get a 2nd one so that we can use one wet and one dry on cleaning days. I'd recommend this larger and sturdier Scotch-Brite Mop to anyone looking to replace their swiffer
customer_reviews.author: Mrs AiseleT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Works precisely as it should. Lasts over a year. I ordered two originally and have now re-ordered. Like using more environmentally friendly, reusable products. Hate using Swifter due to waste, landfill issues, etc. These are washable, reusable and do a great job. I live in a very dusty, dry desert environment and can use them wet or dry. Would highly recommend. I've reordered and continue to use. I'd recommend several a year as they last about a year if you interchange a few, what with all the washings.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mop for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this to replace my older Scotch-Brite mop. I had an exact one for years, and I accidentally broke it, so I was desperate looking for a replacement but can't find anywhere else but Amazon. This is a great mop for what I need, I usually it multiple times in a day, and it's quick and make my hardwood floor nice and clean. Very excited and please to know I can still get it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it is not definitely for the large ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is not definitely for the large area wooden floooring. We have two dogs and I have to keep cleaning the mop 2/3 times during the process. It also doesn't pick up the small crumbs which I was expecting to happen. I may have to return it. It would have been a good mop otherwise. One more thing..the handle it long and not adjustable :(
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Works great on boats
customer_reviews.text: I have one for hard wood floors, this one is for cleaning the boat. It moves easily gives me a good reach works great
customer_reviews.author: dawn gentry

customer_reviews.title: Move over swiffer!
customer_reviews.text: Good: Microfiber is a miracle invention. I use a spray bottle to apply my cleaning solution and wipe/scrub with this mop. I can't believe not too long ago I used a standard mop and bucket setup. Never again! Bad: The pole could bend if you apply too much force down its shaft. Recommended? Yes. It's better than swiffers and the standard mop.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Light to handle and beautiful cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is great to clean hardwood floor, it is light to handle, it picks up dirt without leaving strikes and just put it into the washer machine to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Moya

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok product for the price. It doesn't pick up if the particle if it is little bigger. However it is light weight and the microfiber cloth is easy to wash and durable. It is good for quick cleaning the spills but I don't recommend this for cleaning the whole floor.
customer_reviews.author: Shiv

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding wood floor mop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a spray bottle of Murphy's Oil & tap water (no rinse hardwood floor cleaner) and could not be more happy with the 3M Scotch - Brite Mop. Just sweep your floor to get all the big stuff and dust balls up - then spray on some cleaner and start mopping the floor. Once I get done I just rinse out in hot water and put on the patio to dry. This beats a regular foam mop and water by a factor of 10x - no water left to dry on your wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: USMC-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Installed a new laminated floors, I read all review how to clean it. Glad I did read how easy it is to use and picks up everything without pushing the dust. Used it on my tile in bathroom, picks up hair. I have only used it dry so far and bought a spare replacement mop head, because a customer recommended it. Polishes without water all dull spots from water spots of the wood. Other ratings said everything you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Ingeborg Coffman

customer_reviews.title: are the best things ever
customer_reviews.text: These cloths, and the mop they go with, are the best things ever. I want to stockpile them so I never have to clean with anything else. I use them wet and dry on both my hardwood floors and my kitchen and bathroom linoleum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Picks up dusk, hair and dusk bunnies well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: scc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop was the first microfiber mop I have purchased and used and I love it! It make mopping so easy. I'm 5'8 and the handle is long enough for me to mop comfortably. The microfiber pad is easy to put on and take off pole. The material picks up so much dirt.
customer_reviews.author: A561Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Lots of replacements available for the duster part and more economic and more ecologically friendly than Swifter and other "disposable" products. I can't use disposables as they don't clean well enough and I use too many refills for our dusty climate. Great on pet hair too! I'd suggest buying more replacement heads as they do wear a bit during washing. One lasts me about 6 months before it begins to lose it's wicking strength.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: really cleans hardwood floors well, dry and wet.
customer_reviews.text: much better than my previous mop system. using this with Bona on hardwood floors. just be sure to switch it out every so often so buy a couple extra. this material isn't going to absorb a lot so you will need to switch to a new one after mopping the size of a small room. also works well dry like a dust mop but better. and no toxic stuff and garbage generated like with swiffers.
customer_reviews.author: grammiet

customer_reviews.title: Does a fine job and pads are machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Although I usually use the Rubbermaid Reveal Spray Mop, my housecleaner prefers the Scotch-Brite, which doesn't come with a sprayer but she finds easier to work with, probably because it's lighter. I've noticed she even uses it to do the very large mirror above the bathroom sinks. Works like a charm, especially when you’re short.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great mop for dusting and cleaning floors.
customer_reviews.text: After searching online for a mop that would be good for my engineered wood floors, I found this one by reading Amazon reviews. It works beautifully and effortlessly, and it can be used for dusting the floors and/or really cleaning them by spraying a mist (one quart water mixed with one tablespoon vinegar, which I learned from another review). This mop easily removes the dirt and leaves floors sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: mellouel

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used the swifter wet jet for years on my floors and have always struggled with streaks. I finally decided to look for something else to try I have a mix of laminate and tile that I used this on. I did not have a problem with streaks, I do miss the 'scrubber' piece that came with the swifter for stuck on pieces, but overall this did a good job. I did as others commented I got a second microfiber piece and used it as a 'dry dust' on my floors changed pieces and then did a 'wet mop.' Would recommend and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Best idea in mopheads!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance compared to standard sponge mops. I use Mr. Clean cleaner diluted in a spray bottle for cleaning our kitchen and dining areas (ceramic tile) and it does great. If you use a cleaner added to water, use the cleaner SPARINGLY unless you plan on rinsing with nothing but water, otherwise your floor will be sticky! Overall I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Devout Patriot

customer_reviews.title: A simple, multi-use tool
customer_reviews.text: Such a great tool. My wife loves it. It can flip for doing baseboards with one swipe. It is gentle enough to do a quick wall wipe down. It is really nice to just pop off the cover and throw it in the washer, always fresh and clean. Nice for cleaning steps.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my hard wood floors. I have a Shark steamer, but the pad would stick to the hard wood, and become very hard to push back and forth along the floor. With this, I used a spray bottle of hot water & vinegar (which really brought out the shine on the wood floor) as I cleaned, and the mop head glided effortlessly across the floor. The microfiber cloth comes off the mop head easily, so you can toss it in the washer to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Granny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good washable floor mop! Little high on price but quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: linuxguru

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: The handle for this product is all one piece- very important. The head folds down to add a new pad, which slips on (its not velcro) The mops do a great job. I expect it to last a long time. I had a Bona and it was terrible. The handle kept falling apart (it was in multiple pieces) and eventually broke.
customer_reviews.author: kellyo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome floor mop
customer_reviews.text: I love that this floor mop has a microfiber cover that you can just toss into the laundry after cleaning. I generally spray with water and then spray with cleaning solution and swipe it over all of my hardwood floors in my apartment. Cleaning is a breeze and it works really well. The mop itself is very easy to maneuver and swipe around the toilet and corners.
customer_reviews.author: K.Wolf

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can wash them after each use
customer_reviews.text: These are replacements for my old ones which I had for many years. I keep two, so when ones in the wash, I still have a clean one. I like that I can wash them after each use. I feel this keeps my floors more sanitary then a mop you just rinse in the sink between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last me over 9 years!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought the first two 9 years ago and they are still work great! I use them for both dry and wet mop on both hardwood and tile floor. I bought 4 more so I can use to clean my entire house so I don’t have to wash them as often. Once done you can just throw them in washing machine. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chongkol G

customer_reviews.title: found my mop!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans really well. I used it with Black Diamond hard wood floor cleaner. What I like the best is the ease of taking the dirty microfiber cloth off and putting a new one on. I have broken mops before trying to get them apart. This is super simple and seems very strong. Bought an extra cloth so I can wash one and have one on it. Good for quick cleanups too, cause you dont get it soaking wet, just spray something on it and swipe.
customer_reviews.author: swks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, wish it was a little more scrubby
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a few mops looking for one that doesn't stay wet when I'm done. Because I'm allergic to mold, the moisture that remains on traditional mops makes me sniffly and tired when I use the mop. The mop head dries quickly, doesn't get damaged if you use a bleach solution, and cleans well. If there is something really stuck to your floor, it takes some effort to remove. But it does a great job with everyday messes.
customer_reviews.author: sac727

customer_reviews.title: Great broom. It catches the hair of my 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. It catches the hair of my 4 dogs no problem. I've had it for months and does not think I've washed it yet. Just peel off the dog hair and you're off and sweeping again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber Floor Mop
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I love it. It makes cleaning this new floor I just had installed, a snap. Instead of scrubbing, rinsing, waxing and polishing my old floor once a week on my hands & knees -- now I just spray and whisk this little mop over the whole deal every morning in 5 minutes and it is perfect. Very easy to use and extremely flexible on corners and under fixtures. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Anne Laird

customer_reviews.title: Really like this mop
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I have laminate floors and this is a gentle well made mop that cleans them beautifully. I use a spray cleaner that I make myself and simply spray it on the mop head and it gets the floors looking like new. I haven't washed the mop head yet but I am guessing it will clean up fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Better like green.
customer_reviews.text: Great! What can one say in praise of a mop head???
customer_reviews.author: cyclopse

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: This mop works better than a standard broom on my tile and hardwood floors. It picks up both cat & human hair with ease, and I just use my dustpan brush to clean the pad between washings. It also gets under furniture, cabinets & my washer and dryer without any trouble. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best mop for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I wish someone had told me ten years ago what sort of cleaning products are worth buying. This would be near the top of my list. I love that I can throw the microfiber cleaning cloth in the wash with my towels on a hot setting. I keep two on hand and refuse to buy mops that can't be thrown in my washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mop to use with the Black Diamond floor cleaner. I bought one mop and two microfiber mop heads. The microfiber heads come off easy and go on easy. After using I through the dirty one in the washer and replace the mop with the other one on hand. Covers a nice size area ... and with the Black Diamond ... my floors look great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It works great on my reclaimed wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I've used this system for years with a spritzer bottle filled with water, vinegar and essential oils. It works great on my reclaimed wood floors. The extra pad was shipped very quickly and I was relieved to see them on Amazon, because they are no longer available in stores I visit.
customer_reviews.author: Wende Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Great on the second try
customer_reviews.text: First one came in a flat box offering no protection to the handle at all. It was badly bent. Of course Amazon took it back and the second one came in a proper box, similar to like what you would expect golf clubs to ship in. Handle was perfect and the mop is a big upgrade over the swifter we used to use on our entirely hardwood floor home.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this except it's made of microfiber
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except it's made of microfiber. I have like 10 of these and I wish I had known how bad for the environment they were before I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers had said, this is a great product, but I was pleasantly surprised, nonetheless. Picks up the dust and dirt even in the corners, and washes easily and dries in the dryer. It is good to have a couple on hand so that you always have a clean one to go. It is easy to slip it on the mop and with a click it stays in place as it should. No cons for these!
customer_reviews.author: Ginbit

customer_reviews.title: Great picker upper
customer_reviews.text: This microfiber mop does a fantastic job on my hardwood floors. It cleans and shines it nicely and picks up every piece of dust and hair. Great investment for your home. By the way it cleans tile floors very nicely as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: The mop was wrapped in plastic wrap and arrived bent, but still usable. This is a really good system I've used for years. I decided it was time to buy a second one for my downstairs area. I use it with a spritzer bottle of water, vinegar and essential oils. Luv it!
customer_reviews.author: Ski Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! Have had one for years and recently bought an additional one for our second floor. So easy to quickly dust mop on laminate floors! Also works well for spray mopping!
customer_reviews.author: william allen

customer_reviews.title: So great to find a place to buy these replacement mop ...
customer_reviews.text: So great to find a place to buy these replacement mop heads. This is the only mop I use and I have about five of these pads. So easy to use, wash, dry and reuse. They last a really long time. I dampen them with water/vinegar, ring out, put on the head and mop the hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: bb148

customer_reviews.title: This mop is pretty good. I also have an O'Cedar microfiber mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is pretty good. I also have an O'Cedar microfiber mop. I like the way this mop functions better - the head is sturdy and doesn't wiggle about. BUT I like the actual microfiber pad on the O'Cedar better. I think this will be the mop I continue to use, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: Great picker upper
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for cleaning and floor surface. It makes my hardwood floor shine beautifully. It makes my kitchen and bathrooms tile floors clean and smooth. Great investment for your home
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product and perfoms well.
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrific product. I wash microfiber cloths separately from other fabric and hang to quickly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Grace

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light and the green microfiber cover really stays in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty light and the green microfiber cover really stays in place. After repeated use the handle does get unscrewed from the base, one just has to screw it in again, not a big problem at all. My teenage sons find it easy to use too and clean their own bedroom floors. Using a hardwood floor cleaning spray along with it, makes the job much easier to clean marks on wood and laminate floors.
customer_reviews.author: earthchild11

customer_reviews.title: This product works great for applying floor wax
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for applying floor wax. Smooth, even, no waste, no fuss. And it washes up nice in the washer on a light cycle. Terrific value!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Anastas

customer_reviews.title: Does excellent job trapping dog hair and dust.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop - we have two dogs and dark hardwood floors - I hated sweeping and mopping but now I don't mind at all. It does an excellent job of trapping dog hair and dust. I got two refills so I am never without a clean pad. The positive reviews on this mop far outweigh the negative ones - and for good reason!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L L L

customer_reviews.title: Surprised...in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Much better than my commercial dust mop by far. Dust bunnies (dog and cat fur) stays on it while you use it and shakes off when you want it to. I cannot do that with my other mop. Sometimes I have to vacuum the mop clean...isn't that crazy? Good for price. Sometimes on sale at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Floor Mop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mop to use with the Black Diamond floor cleaner. I bought one mop and two microfiber mop heads. The microfiber heads come off easy and go on easy. After using I through the dirty one in the washer and replace the mop with the other one on hand. Covers a nice size area ... and with the Black Diamond ... my floors look great!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  for Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love my scotch brite floor mop! I've had 2 of them for years. I gave one of mine to my daughter for her hardwood floors. Recently, I haven't been able to find in any of the typical BBB, HD, Lowes, Walmart, etc. There are newer type models that velcro on and are smaller. I don't think they clean as well. Was very happy to find them on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: mop--get this one!
customer_reviews.text: If it's possible to enjoy dusting your laminate floor, this is it. It hinges in every direction, so will go flat under the couch, behind anything with enough space to fit, does a great job and instant gratification--with little effort you get a big pile of dust ready for the dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: jlf

customer_reviews.title: Mop as described, Packaging Extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: This thing deserves 5 stars for the packaging alone. Our cats have been playing in the nearly 6 foot long box for hours. I don't think they'll ever tire of it. The mop seems to be exactly as described. If you have playful cats, buy this mop. The handle doesn't break down short like a Swiffer so with this one you'll get two for one - a cat toy and a mop.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingElse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazing! I put quickshine on the floor and just run it around and my floor sparkles. It turns sideways for easy use in small places too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alternative to Disposables
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mop for a few months on my floors (bamboo). Excellent performance and the cover washes up beautifully. AND it is not white which is so discouraging to try to keep white! I only wish that the mop came with a second cover as a package, but it is easy to order an extra and I recommend that so you can (theoretically) always have clean floors.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known about this product sooner! It's so easy to use. I just spray my laminate/hardwood floor cleaner on the pad and mop my floor in minutes! I bought an extra pad, which I would recommend for big jobs. The pads are also washable so I can just throw it in with the laundry after I'm finished. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Isom

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning lady and I agree it is simply the BEST for cleaning hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: I searched this out, needing to leave one with the new owners of our house as a present, and to gift my cleaning lady with one for her house, since I'm taking the older one I have with me to the new home. The cleaning lady and I agree it is simply the BEST for cleaning hardwoods. Make sure to get a few refills of the microfiber part to go with the mop so you can switch them out as you clean. Machine wash, air dry. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: quiltsrock

customer_reviews.title: Does a simple thing well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the good ratings (funny how something as simple as a mop can be such a hassle to use) and it hasn't disappointed. It is easy to manipulate and picks up dirt with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Geminica

product_meta.title: 3M M-005 Scotch-Brite Microfiber Hardwood Floor Mop, 1-pack, 1
product_meta.description:
Style:Cleaning SystemDo you see dust bunnies multiplying on your beautiful hardwood floors? Scotch-Brite(TM) Microfiber Hardwood Floor Mop is a slick and simple way to clean hardwood, laminate and bamboo floors. The reusable microfiber blend cloth lifts and traps dust for clean, dust-free floors in seconds.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
When your floor is clean, your whole home feels cleaner. Help keep your floors hair and dust free with our dusters. Use them on floors, walls, even ceilings, to clean up dust and dirt.
feature_bullets: Traps and lifts dust and dirt.
Use with your favorite wood floor cleaner
Also designed for laminate and bamboo floors
Cleaning Strength - Absorb, Delicate Care, Heavy Duty, Non-Scratch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars965 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
